name: Wedding Photograohy
description: Take a look around my site and feel free to snoop around my Instagram feed. It’ll give you a good idea of who I am and what makes me tick. Looking forward to crossing paths and hearing your story!

name: Birthday Photography
description: Photographing a child’s birthday is a great way to remember the child at that point in time. It is amazing how much people change as they grow, and you want to be able to look back years later.Here I am to live your memories.

name: Fashion Photography
description: If you want to change yourself and express yourself as a fashionable model, just check my website.
